CustomField.description:
Total sum of amount of related open opportunity records. This sum is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Sum_of_Open_Printing_Opps__c
Criteria for open new business is opportunity segment = Print, stage is not closed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Annual Opportunity Revenue of all open print opportunities
CustomField.label: Open Printing Opportunities
